Milt,
They'd probably be attributed to Edo Kinko.  I don't think that getting an attribution to a school would be very likely.  FWIW, the style of the Nio in "052F" was used by Yokoya Somin.  His Juyo Bunkazai Nio futakoromono from the Kyoto National Museum was on display in Washington DC about five years ago in the big Art of Edo show at the National Gallery.  It would have been worth the trip even if that was the only thing to see.

Jim



  please klick...............

  http://tinyurl.com/4lqsp

  these are my Nio menuki. I know menuki is hard to " kantei ", but any 
  opinion as to school is appreciated.

  Gorby....... shoami is unacceptable.


  milt
